alert.note: Alert for Dale; Geneva; Henry; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 11:09AM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Dale, southwestern Henry, eastern Geneva, Houston, northern Jackson, northeastern Washington and southwestern Early Counties through 100 PM EDT/NOON CDT/... At 1209 PM EDT/1109 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Graceville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Daleville, Cottonwood, Marianna, Graceville, Headland, Dothan, Enterprise, Fort Rucker, Hartford, Taylor, Midland City, Kinsey, Ashford, Level Plains, Slocomb, Cowarts, Newton, Webb, Columbia and Pinckard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 PM EDT/400 PM CDT/ for southeastern Alabama...and the Panhandle of Florida.
